mapper.insert: insert into manager (managerID, managerName, telephone, email, addTime, status, role) values (#{managerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update manager
managerName = #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where managerID = #{managerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
